title: Investigating the Paranormal
description: I am the founder and owner of a very successful paranormal investigation team called the South Central Illinois and Oklahoma Ghost Hunters (SCI-OGH). Within this book, there are step-by-step instructions for creating your own paranormal investigation team. Learn the types of equipment, paranormal definitions, copies of our group forms and helpful tips and ideas for you to use toward getting your group started. I have also included stories from our Haunted Home Base Diary for your reading enjoyment.
author: Amanda Springer
